aircraft.value: Minotaur Heavy - AC-3021-432 at Forward Operating Base-2

defect_observed.value: Engine vibration level increase. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 29/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 02/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 01/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 05/12/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 04/12/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Engine vibration level increase. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
